revised_title: Mineralogical Study and Chemical Analysis of Corundum, Sapphire, and Oriental Ruby
tldr: The author presents a detailed study and chemical analysis of the corundum stone, sapphire, and oriental ruby, providing a mineralogical history of these gemstones and their properties. The author demonstrates that these stones are all varieties of the same mineral, corundum, and discusses their chemical compositions, crystal structures, and origins.
